Y ven una gran oportunidad de crecimiento en el programa de la fundacin paraguaya. La Sra. Josefa es una de las integrantes y nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de bebidas en general. Empez con un pequeo negocio y luego gracias a su trabajo y arduo esfuerzo ha podido ir creciendo y tener un negocio bien surtido. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de bebidas, como ser gaseosas, vinos, cervezas y dems tipos, con lo cual podr abastecerse y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando.

loan.use: Comprar bebidas para la venta.

loan.name: Pablo Dario

texts.es:
Pablo es un padre de 43 aos, el cual tiene 4 pequeos por los que lucha da a da con el fin de sacarlos adelante y brindarles lo mejor, su esposa, que es ama de casa, siempre trata de apoyarlo y cuidarlo para que juntos puedan mejorar su calidad de vida. Pablo disfruta mucho ver televisin en sus tiempos libres y mucho ms cuando lo hace con sus hijos. Como buen peruano, Pablo disfruta mucho de los platos tpicos de nuestro pas, el cul es el conocidsimo Arroz con pollo.
Pablo se dedica a alquiler de 2 taxis, los cuales pudo comprar con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacin de su parte, lo que lo ha llevado a mejorar y crecer como micro-empresario. El nos comenta que alquila sus carros un promedio de 10 horas diarias lo que le permite generar los ingresos que necesita para sus necesidades personales diarias.
Con un poco de apoyo, Pablo podr realizar el mantenimiento y refaccin de los vehculos, lo que le permitir tener operativos sus 2 vehculos, ya que tienen algunos desperfectos y desea solucionarlos antes de que estos empeoren. Con esta ayuda brindada, el podr seguir alquilando sus vehculos y poco a poco ahorrar el dinero que necesita para comprar nuevos vehculos y mejorar su calidad de vida.

loan.use: Para el mantenimiento y refaccin de su vehculo.

loan.name: Aleyda Patricia

texts.es: Aleyda, habitante del Transito municipio localizado en las afueras de Len, se dedica al comercio vende granos bsicos, productos de limpieza, cosmticos. Su primer crdito Kiva lo utilizo para la compra de cosmticos, granos bsicos, perfumes y productos de limpieza. Esta inversin le permiti mejorar sus ventas surtir su negocio y le abri la oportunidad de ganar nuevos clientes. Es por ello que solicita el crdito para la compra de avenas, sopas, detergente, dulces, pan , jugos y gaseosas ,pues son productos que a diario solicitan sus clientes y no les puede fallar. Adems que ella tiene como meta variar los productos y vender aquellos que ms le soliciten sus clientes para ir mejorando su negocio.

loan.use: para la compra de avenas, sopas, detergente, dulces, pan , jugos y gaseosas.

loan.name: Maria Leticia

texts.es: Maria Leticia,tiene 39 aos de edad y tiene 2 hijos, ella inicio su negocio cuando era muy joven empeso vendiendo productos por catalogo, luego estudio en confeccion de costuras, y ya por ultimo puso una tienda de productos comestibles de primera nececidad ella vende, arroz,frijol, aceite,etc esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles,el sueo de ella es terminar sus estudios ya que esta sacando el nivel basico por madurez. espera que le puedan dar ese apoyo que ella nececita para su negocio.

loan.use: Compra de productos comestibles para la venta.

loan.name: Yesenia Catalina

texts.es: Yesenia, de 31 aos de edad, habitante de la Ceiba comarca localizada en las afueras del departamento de Len, se dedica a la crianza de cerdo y siembra de maz. Esta muy agradecida por la ayuda recibida atravez del prstamo Kiva utilizo el financiamiento para comprar cerdos de raza y reproduccin con el objetivo de producir cerdos de calidad y buen peso, le ha ido muy bien tanto asi que ha logrado cancelar su credito antes de tiempo. Ahora est solicitando nuevamente este prstamo comprar ms cerdos de raza para produccin, pues una de sus metas es tener una granja de cerdos reproductores de buen peso y tamao. Siempre tiene como planes construir una galera para tener en mejores condiciones a sus animales.

loan.use: comprar ms cerdos de raza

loan.name: Santa Ines Group

texts.es: El comit se Denomina Santa Ins estn en el Segundo Ciclo con 18 integrantes , es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unidas solidarias y responsable entre ellas y realizan labores de trabajos en equipos , las mismas tienen un gran espritu emprendedor y luchador. Antonia es una de las integrantes, es la presidenta del grupo y nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropas desde hace ya un tiempo. Su meta es poder seguir trabajando y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando a su familia. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de todo tipo, como ser remeras, camperas, pantalones y dems. Agradece a la fundacin y a kiva por la ayuda que esta recibiendo.

loan.use: Comprar prendas para la venta.

loan.name: David Acuna

texts.en: Together, David and his wife own and operate a community daycare facility in Orlando, Florida. Both of them are driven entrepreneurs with the skills and experience in child care to run their own facility. David has various academic degrees in both education and pedagogy, as well as extensive teaching experience in his native Venezuela. Their daycare has been in operation for over 3 years now, and they both see it as more than just a daycare facility. It is a learning environment for the children. David sees this as one of the most important missions of his facility. He wants to engage the children and help them remain active physically and mentally while visiting his facility. This loan would help drive David's mission. He would like to purchase new equipment for the children of the daycare to use.

loan.use: To purchase more and newer equipment for his daycare

loan.name: Irma Orbelina

texts.es: Irma, necesita un nuevo financiamiento para invertir al negocio de pan y mejorar algunas cosas en su vivienda, pues desea mantener lo suficiente de dinero para mantener disponible pan de diferentes clases para la reventa. Ella manifiesta que el prstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar el techo de su casa y que su negocio marche bien, para seguir mejorando y superando junto a sus familiares.

loan.use: Para la compra de pan.

loan.name: Sulma Marina

texts.es:
Sulma de 40 aos de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos con edades de 8, 16, 20 y 23 aos de edad, vive en una aldea de Morazn, Yoro.
Hace 6 aos que doa Sulma estableci su propio negocio de una pulpera donde vende productos como ser: azcar, arroz, sal, huevos, refrescos, frijoles, dulces etc.de este negocio que inicio con propios esfuerzos, obtiene ingresos que le permiten cubrir gastos de alimentacin y educacin a sus hijos. Ha recibido apoyo de ODEF mediante prstamos donde ha podido mantener surtido el negocio y tener una mejor estabilidad econmica familiar. Actualmente est solicitando el quinto prstamo para surtir ms de productos alimenticios como arroz, azcar, frijoles, refrescos, pan, dulce, leche, etc. La meta que tiene es primero darle la educacin necesaria a sus hijos, y ampliar el local del negocio.

loan.use: Surtir el negocio de pulperia en productos alimenticios como: azucar, arroz, frijoles, refrescos,sal, pan, dulces, leche y otros.

loan.name: Juan Leonidas

texts.es: Juan, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboracin de hamacas, como el hilo, manquillos, agujas, todo lo necesario y que le ayude a mejorar su produccin. l considera que el prstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar la vivienda para que su familia este en mejores condiciones.

loan.use: Compra de hilo, manquillos, agujas.

loan.name: Vilma Esperanza

texts.es: Vilma, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo porque quiere realizar la compra de billetes de lotera, comprara dos series para salir a ofrecer a la clientela, esto le ayudara para que su negocio no decaiga. Ella considera que el prstamo anterior le ayudo para mejora el negocio, que sus ventas fueron buenas y aumento los clientes demandantes de lotera.

loan.use: Para la compra de dos series de loteria.

loan.name: Benjamin

texts.es: Benjamn, necesita un nuevo prstamo porque est iniciando la cosecha, para lo cual deber alquilar terreno para el cultivo de maz y frijol, esto le ayudara para asegurar su trabajo en el nuevo cultivo. El manifiesta que el prstamo anterior le ayudo para la compra de insumos agrcolas, dndole una buena cosecha, y de sus ganancias continuar estudiando.

loan.use: Para el alquiler de terreno.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loan.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es: Rigoberto, se decidi por un nuevo prstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, alquiler de terreno, pues est iniciando su prximo cultivo, con esta ayudara estar en las condiciones para realizar un buen trabajo. El prstamo anterior le ayudo dndole los recursos necesarios para tener una buena produccin, fue su primer prstamo pero le ayudo mucho y esto le motiva a seguir trabajando.

loan.use: Compra de abono, herbicidas, alquiler de terreno.

loan.name: Ricardo Andres

texts.es:
Ricardo es un joven que decidi montar su propio negocio con el nimo de generar sus propios ingresos, y as sostener sus gastos y al mismo tiempo contribuir econmicamente en su hogar. Desde hace aproximadamente 3 aos mont un parqueadero de motos y carros, en el cual trabaja en largas jornadas y gracias al buen servicio que ofrece ya puede generar un empleo. Con este negocio Ricardo ha logrado tener muy buenos ingresos que le han permitido a el y a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias al crecimiento que ha tenido su negocio, Ricardo busca que un prstamo le brinde la oportunidad de realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas a su parqueadero de modo que pueda tener una mayor capacidad para aparcar ms vehculos.
De esta manera sus ingresos aumentarn considerablemente, pues podr atender a ms clientes en su negocio. Adems, con mayores ingresos su familia podr tener una mejor calidad de vida y Ricardo podr acceder a una mejor estabilidad econmica y un futuro econmico mejor.

loan.use: Realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas a su parqueadero de modo que pueda tener una mayor capacidad para aparcar ms vehculos.

loan.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro tiene 57 aos de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos de 20, 18, 14 y 12 aos de edad, vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Don Pedro se dedica hace 4 aos a la agricultura al cultivo de pltano. El tiene una finca que le fue heredada de su padre. Don Pedro aparte de la agricultura tiene otro negocio de cra y venta de ovejos .El prstamo que solicita a ODEF de 10, 000 lempiras es para comprar un lote de ovejos para criarlos y despus venderlos. El manifiesta que el precio de estos animales es muy bueno lo que le permitir incrementar sus ingresos. Su meta es seguir aumentado sus ingresos y trabajar lo propio como hasta ahora lo ha hecho.

loan.use: Compra de un lote de ovejos para la venta.

loan.name: Estebana

texts.es: Estebana, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo para la compra de alimento para los cerdos y arreglar el corral, su compra ser en concentrado, lamina y madera, esto le ayudara para mantener bien su negocio. El efecto que tuvo de su prstamo anterior fue positivo, porque logro comprar materiales para realizar la milpa, ya que esto le ayuda para tener ingresos para la familia.

loan.use: Compra de concentrado, lamina y madera

loan.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Mara, se ha decidido por un nuevo prstamo, pues considera que con su ayuda ir creciendo en la produccin de las tortillas, comprara maz, gas, cal, lea, que son los materiales para mantener todo listo para elaborar las tortillas. El prstamo anterior le permiti comprar los materiales para mantenerse en el negocio, cambiando sus ventas, porque son ms favorables y le generan ms ingresos.

loan.use: Compra de maz, gas, cal, lea.

loan.name: Sara De Jesus

texts.es: Sara, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo para la compra de productos para fortalecer el negocio, comprando aceite, embutidos, maz, frijoles, queso, ya que desea mantener todo lo ms necesario y as mantener la preferencia de los clientes. La condicin econmica de Sara ha cambiado, pues con el prstamo anterior logro que sus ganancias fueran mejor, viviendo en mejores condiciones.

loan.use: Compra de aceite, embutidos, maz, frijoles, queso.

loan.name: Jose Adan

texts.es: Jos, necesita un nuevo prstamo para fortalecer el negocio, pues quiere comprar arroz, azcar, jabn, detergentes, para surtir el negocio, ya que as sus clientes encuentran lo que necesitan en sus hogares. El prstamo anterior le ayudo para invertir en el negocio, con el cual ha generado mejores ventas, y ganancias, apoyando de una mejor manera su familia.

loan.use: Compra de arroz, azcar, jabn, detergentes.

loan.name: Joseline Patricia

texts.es: Joseline, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo porque considera que de estos prstamos ha logrado superar su situacin con el negocio, comprndose un pedido de lociones, cosmticos, para la venta, surtiendo de nuevos productos. El prstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar el negocio, aumentndole las ganancias, con las que ha podido continuar estudiando en la universidad.

loan.use: Para la compra de lociones, cosmticos, para la venta.

loan.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Mara, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo, para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para el cultivo, pagando el arrendamiento del terreno y comprando insumos como el abono y los herbicidas. Ella espera que con este prstamo pueda realizarse un buen cultivo, que su produccin se abundante, as como pudo realizar su trabajo anterior con la ayuda de un prstamo.

loan.use: Pago de alquiler de terreno, compra de abono y herbicidas.

loan.name: Martin

texts.es: El solicitante es chofer que tiene un taxi propio, afiliado a la Asociacin de transpote de las 6 federaciones del trpico de Cochabamba, realizando su actividad en la zona del Chapare, Sacaba y otras zonas aledaas a Cercado. Trabaja hace 5 aos con transporte, paralelamente la esposa (codeudora) trabaja con el comercio de papa, vende 3 veces a la semana, realizando la compra en Sacaba y comunidades vecinos de su morada, vendiendo a su clientela que le demanda cada semana, son las dos actividades que generan ingresos suficientes a la familia mensualmente, demostrando que tiene capacidad de pago para el presente crdito. El sr. Caballero solicita el crdito para realizar mejoras en su vivienda de modo de dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.

loan.use: Construccion y mejora de vivienda

loan.name: Wendy Arely

texts.es: Wendy, se ha decidido por un nuevo prstamo, porque quiere invertir en el negocio, comprndose tres cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, este dinero le ayudara para aumentar la granja y tener el alimento necesario para sus cerdos. Ella tuvo en efecto positivo con el prstamo anterior, ya que compro cerdos para el negocio, pues la dinmica es comprarlos, engordarlos y ofrecerlos a la venta, dndole los recursos econmicos para cancelar el prstamo y para el sustento del hogar, en su familia se mantienen los integrantes y gozan de buena salud.

loan.use: Compra de tres cerdos y concentrado.

loan.name: Wilbert Alberto

texts.es: Wilbert, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo, pues quiere comprar los materiales necesarios para realizar la siembra de chile, pues adquiere 1000 plantas y el abono y herbicidas, que son lo que le ayudan a desarrollarse. El prstamo anterior le ayudo a que su cosecha de maiz y frijol fuera buena, ya que su familia depende de su trabajo para salir adelante.

loan.use: Compra de 1000 plantas de chile, el abono y herbicidas

loan.name: Alma Jeannette

texts.es: Alma, se ha decidido por un nuevo prstamo, porque quiere comprarse productos para el negocio, como pltanos verdes, aceite, tambin quiere comprar ropa nueva (blusas, faldas, camisetas) para salir a vender de forma ambulante, esto le ayudara a generar ms ingresos. Ella considera que el prstamo anterior le ayudo a incrementar su mercadera, sus ingresos en las ventas, esto le da la oportunidad de ayudar a sus hijos en la educacin.

loan.use: Compra de platanos verdes y ropa, blusas, faldas y camisetas.

loan.name: Felix Asencio

texts.es:
Flix es un hombre de 62 que es casado y tiene tres hijos. Juntos viven en "Santo Domingo" que es un cantn de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tschilas" el cual es uno de los ms densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que est el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la Y del Colorado. Santo Domingo es un cantn privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno.
Flix desde hace 15 aos tiene una vulcanizadora en la cual repara llantas de todo tipo, pero principalmente de vehculos; con esta actividad ha logrado mantener a su familia y darles lo necesario para llevar una vida modesta. Este es su primer crdito con Fundacin Alternativa, que esta institucin intermediaria entre Kiva y Flix. Necesita comprar un compresor de aire y algunos tubos de llantas para as poder seguir trabajando. Su viejo compresor ya le da problemas por lo que necesita comprar uno nuevo, adems quiere invertir en comprar tubos para llantas, de tal manera que cuando sus clientes lo requieran el tenga todo lo necesario para darles un mejor servicio. Nos comenta que le molesta cuando sus herramientas se pierden o se daan, pero el intenta seguir adelante a pesar de estos inconvenientes.
Su sueo es poder seguir trabajando y dar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida y espera que con esta inversin las cosas mejoren.

loan.use: para comprar un compresor y tubos de llantas

loan.name: Eva Aracelli

texts.es:
Eva es una mujer muy luchadora, tiene 45 aos de edad y desde pequea aprendi a ganarse el pan con el sudor de sus frente ya que ellos tenan pocos recursos pero a pesar de ello supieron darle mucho amor y sacarla adelante, por ello Eva vive con sus padres, los ama mucho y cuida ahora que son adultos mayores, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus playas hermosas, por sus atractivos tursticos como las Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas; tambin es conocido por una de sus actividades principales como la pesca y la agricultura y sobre todo por la amabilidad de su gente. Desde hace 4 aos Eva inicio su negocio de venta de productos de belleza como perfumes, maquillaje, cremas, entre otros, inicio este negocio por la necesidad que tenia de tener un ingreso para su hogar sobre todo para apoyar a sus padres y gracias a una amiga se animo totalmente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es carismtica y porque le brinda facilidades de pago a sus clientes.
Eva agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado ella podr comprar ms mercadera para su negocio como maquillaje, perfumes, entre otros; as ella podr tener ms variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y seguir luchando da a da para hacer realidad sus gran sueo: Crecer como microempresaria y darle una buena calidad de vida a sus padres.

loan.use: Para la compra de mercaderia (maquillaje, perfumes, entre otros)

loan.name: Yesenia Del Carmen

texts.es: Yesenia, est solicitando un prstamo un nuevo prstamo, porque desea comprar elotes, pltanos, para hacer empanadas y tamales, esto le dar mayor solvencia para realizar la venta, ya que depende de este negocio para salir con los compromisos familiares. Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con el prstamo anterior, pues logro tener lo necesario y ha realizado una buena produccin de tamales, considera que los ingresos familiares han mejorado, sin inconvenientes.

loan.use: Compra de elotes y platanos.

loan.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo prstamo, para invertirlo al negocio, ya que las ventas han mejorado, comprara granos bsicos, verduras y artculos para el hogar, para incrementar el inventario y tener ms capacidad para vender. El prstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar las ventas y esto le ha beneficiado con mayores ganancias para mejorar tambin los ingresos del hogar.

loan.use: Compra de granos bsicos, verduras y artculos para el hogar

loan.name: Jose Esteban

texts.es: Jos, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo, esto debido a la necesidad de mejorar y adquirir nuevos materiales que utiliza en la barbera, comprndose una nueva mquina para cortar pelo, talco, papel, locin, peines, esto le ayudara a tener mejor establecida la peluquera y atender mejor a la clientela. Jos considera estar en mejores condiciones que antes de utilizar su primer prstamo, pues gracias a estos financiamientos se ha ido superando, cambiando las condiciones de su familia.

loan.use: Compra de mquina para cortar pelo, talco, papel, locin, peines

loan.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra es una joven emprendedora que a pesar de su corta edad ya ha logrado grandes cosas en su vida, y an sigue luchando fuertemente para seguir progresando en su vida. Sandra es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hija de 3 aos de edad, a quien su padre abandon hace un largo tiempo sin hacer algn aporte econmico para su sostenimiento. Adems de esta adversidad, Sandra tuvo que sufrir la muerte de su hermano, quien desde muy joven le haba enseado la actividad de la venta de comidas rpidas y quien le daba el empleo constantemente. As fue como decidi montar su propio negocio de venta de comidas rpidas, el cual trabaja fuertemente para sacar adelante y poder generar los ingresos necesarios para el hogar. Adems de este negocio, Sandra se encuentra estudiando su carrera universitaria para poder salir adelante y en un futuro poder tener un mejor empleo, y esto demanda mucha parte de su tiempo. Gracias a la buena atencin que ofrece en su negocio, ha logrado captar gran nmero de clientes, lo que le ha garantizado muy buenas ventas; y es por esto que Sandra busca que un prstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un carro de comidas rpidas, e insumos para la preparacin de sus comidas, y as podr generar un puesto de trabajo en su negocio.
De esta manera seguir creciendo y mejorndole la calidad de vida no solo a su familia sino a personas que requieran de los ingresos. Adems, con mayores ingresos podr seguir pagando sus estudios universitarios y seguir ofreciendo a su hija una buena calidad de vida.

loan.use: Compra de un carro de comidas rpidas, e insumos para la preparacin de sus comidas, y as podr generar un puesto de trabajo en su negocio.

loan.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto, contina realizando su labor agrcola, por eso est solicitando un nuevo prstamo, ya que pronto iniciara la siembra y quiere asegurar el terreno donde realizara dicha labor, este prstamo le servir para pagar el alquiler y los insumos como el abono y herbicidas para aplicarlos a la siembra. El prstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar la produccin de maz, ya que compro los materiales necesarios y esto le dio buenos resultados, de donde su familia se ve beneficiada.

loan.use: Para el alquiler de terreno y compra de abono y herbicidas.

loan.name: Gladis

texts.es:
Gladis es una mujer de 55 aos, casada con Jos con quien tiene un hijo de 24 aos; juntos viven en "Santo Domingo" que es un cantn de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tschilas" el cual es uno de los ms densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que est el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la Y del Colorado. Santo Domingo es un cantn privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno.
Esta mujer emprendedora se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mucho tiempo; en este sector donde reside esta actividad es muy comn. Pero Gladis quiere empezar una nueva actividad, la cual represente un nuevo ingreso para la economa familiar y no sea tan sacrificado como lo es la siembra y cosecha. Ella quiere abrir una pequea tienda de vveres y abarrotes en general, pero para ello necesita de un crdito. Fundacin Alternativa, que es la institucin intermediaria entre Gladis y la comunidad KIVA ha visto en ella un potencial cliente; no solamente le brindar el capital que necesita sino que adems le dar asesora de tal manera que ella pueda crecer de una manera sustentable. Este no es su primer crdito, y siempre se ha destacado por sus pagos puntuales
Con este nuevo ingreso, Gladis podr tener una mejor calidad de vida.

loan.use: para ponerse una tienda pequea de vveres

loan.name: Rosa Aminta

texts.es: Rosa, est solicitando un nuevo prstamo para la compra de ms inventario, para aumentar la disponibilidad, esta compra ser en lociones, shampoo, talcos, faldas, pantalones, ropa para nios y ropa interior, con este nuevo prstamo le ayudara para mantener lo necesario y atender la demanda. El prstamo anterior le ayudo a generar mayores ventas, ya que lo invirti en mercadera nueva, fue un efecto positivo, mejorando las condiciones tanto del negocio como de su familia.

loan.use: Compra de lociones, shampoo, talcos, faldas, pantalones, ropa para nios.

loan.name: Disenia Dolores

texts.es: Disenia, comenta que est solicitando un prstamo, porque quiere comprar frutas y verduras frescas, papayas, mangos, manzanas, repollos, gisquiles, pepinos, esto le ayudara para mantener surtido el negocio de frutos frescos para atender mejor a los clientes. El prstamo anterior le ayudo a Disenia a crecer en el negocio, atendiendo a ms clientes, teniendo una mejor solvencia en la vida cotidiana con su familia y generando mejores ganancias.

loan.use: Compra de fresas, papayas, mangos, manzanas, repollos, pepinos.

loan.name: Nubia

texts.es:
Nubia ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, y gracias a sus ganas de trabajar a podido salir adelante y seguir progresando junto a su familia. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 8 hijos, pues su padre los abandon hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribucin econmica para su sostenimiento, Nubia se vio en la obligacin de generar grandes ingresos para poder sostener su hogar. Fue as como una amiga le ense a preparar ensaladas y luego salan y las vendan en las calles de su municipio; de esta manera generaban los ingresos para su hogar y poco a poco el negocio iba creciendo y captando cada vez ms clientes. Actualmente Nubia sigue trabajando en este negocio y sigue generando los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de su hogar, y gracias a que ha conseguido gran variedad de clientes en todos los sectores de su municipio, busca que un prstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una moto con la cual pueda repartir sus productos entre todos los clientes de su municipio.
De esta manera tendr la oportunidad de seguir vendiendo sus productos a ms clientes y seguir ofreciendo en su hogar los ingresos necesarios. Nubia suea con tener un gran negocio y con poder ofrecer a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades econmicas.

loan.use: Compra de una moto con la cual pueda repartir sus productos entre todos los clientes de su municipio.

loan.name: Rhina Esmeralda

texts.es: Rhina, se ha decidido por un nuevo prstamo, para continuar incrementando el negocio, comprando materiales como maz, chicharrn, quesillo, repollo, tomates, gaseosas, chocolate, esta compra espera que le ayude a mejorar el negocio y salir con una mejor produccin de pupusas y antojitos. El prstamo anterior le ayudo Rhina, pues a travs de l creci en la produccin, mantenindose con su familia, generando lo necesario para la alimentacin.

loan.use: Compra de maz, chicharrn, quesillo, repollo, tomates, gaseosas, chocolate.

loan.name: Nelly Lucia

texts.es: Nelly, se decidi por un nuevo prstamo, ya que necesita invertir en el negocio, ella comprara productos como azcar, frijoles, aceite, para mantener disponibilidad en la tienda, que sus clientes estn satisfechos con los productos que ofrece. El efecto que tuvo con el prstamo anterior fue positivo, permitindole fortalecerse y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

loan.use: Compra de azcar, frijoles, aceite.

loan.name: Alicia Esperanza

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer de 52 aos, es una madre soltera, su hijo tiene 20 aos de edad. Juntos viven en "Santo Domingo" que es un cantn de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tschilas" el cual es uno de los ms densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que est el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la Y del Colorado. Santo Domingo es un cantn privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno.
Alicia es duea de un pequeo jardn de infantes (centro de educacin infantil) desde hace 15 aos ubicado en la parroquia donde ella reside. Trabaja junto a una profesora parvularia a quien da empleo. Alicia desea renovar su inmobiliario ya que el que actualmente tiene ya tiene algunos aos de uso. Con esto ella espera servir mejor a sus pequeos clientes, y as darles un buen trato.
Para esta renovacin ella necesita un crdito con el cual pueda cumplir su objetivo. Este no es su primer crdito, ha tenido crditos grupales anteriormente sin embargo si es su primer crdito individual. Se puede ver que esta empresaria ha crecido gracias a las microfinanzas.
Su sueo es poder tener un masterado en educacin y as poder tener un centro educativo con una mejor calidad y no solamente para tener mayores ingresos sino porque su vocacin es dar a los infantes sus primeros conocimientos.

loan.use: para comprar inmobiliario para su jardn de infantes

loan.name: Veronica Guadalupe

loan.name: Manuel Mesas

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre soltero de 31 aos que vive con su padre en la parroquia "Luz de Amrica" de "Santo Domingo" que es una de las ciudades ms jvenes del Ecuador, actualmente se ha constituido en el punto de enlace entre las regin Sierra y Costa del pas. Es un sitio privilegiado, no solo por la riqueza tnica, sino tambin por los paisajes inusitados que se pueden encontrar desde el ingreso mismo a esta bella ciudad. Santo Domingo de los Colorados pertenece actualmente a la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tschilas, recientemente conformada. La fiesta principal de Santo Domingo, se celebra con un movimiento intenso de visitantes, intercambio comercial y cultural. Una gran feria tiene lugar en las instalaciones de la Asociacin de Ganaderos, all se muestran y compiten los mejores ejemplares de las distintas razas y cruces que son criados en las haciendas de la regin.
Manuel se dedica junto a su padre a la agricultura desde hace 15 aos y esta actividad es el sustento de su hogar. Le ha ido bien, ya que gracias a esto ha podido llevar una vida modesta. Tiene una oportunidad de comprar un terreno, con lo cual podr ampliar sus cultivos y con ello sus ingresos; por ello desea obtener un crdito con el cual pueda crecer.
Manuel suea con un da poder construir su casa propia y su automvil. Tambin quisiera encontrar una mujer con la que pueda tener una buena familia. Y esta es su meta de vida y a la que considera ms importante que su meta econmica

El prstamo anterior le permiti a Sonia poder aumentar los productos en el negocio, dndoles una mejor atencin a los clientes y mejorando las condiciones del hogar.

loan.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es: Adanely es miembro del Grupo Solidario Los Girasoles, tiene 46 aos de edad, es casada y madre de cuatro hijos, su esposo trabaja en los E.U.A, es una familia muy unida y muy luchadora, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano y tambin a la venta de frutas. Adanely inicio a vender ropa usada hace 6 aos atrs, trabaja en conjunto con sus hijos y lo hacen de forma ambulante. Todos los das muy temprano por las maanas como a eso de las 7:00 a.m salen a las comunidades mas cercanas a realizar sus ventas y luego regresan a casa como a las 7:00 p.m. una de sus dificultades es que no tiene un medio de transporte y como ella trabaja de forma ambulante, tiene que andar a jaln o en bus. Adanely es una persona muy jovial, amable y muy conocida por sus vecinos. Ella solicita este prstamo para comprar un fardo de ropa usada y as surtir su negocio de estilos actuales y acordes a la temporada de verano, adems de comprar sandias para vender. Con el apoyo de este prstamo podr llamar la atencin de ms clientes y seguir teniendo una actividad econmica que le permita cubrir los gastos para la manutencin de su familia. Su sueo es tener un local propio y ayudar a sus hijos a realizarse profesionalmente. Adanely tiene 10 ciclos de recibir financiamiento en FAMA y ha cumplido puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.

loan.name: Divino Nio De Tohalla (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Divino Nio de Tohalla se rene cada quince das en el sitio del mismo nombre en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace un tiempo atrs y formar este banco comunal, el cual les ha ayudado mucho ya que con los crditos que recibieron de la institucin han podido mejorar sus pequeos negocios, ellos se dedican a varias actividades pero en su mayora a la elaboracin de ladrillos y a la agricultura.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la seora Mara Edulfa, tiene 53 aos de edad, es madre soltera de un hijo el cual ya es mayor de edad y estudia medicina en una universidad en Manta.
Ella ha tenido que luchar muy duro para sacar adelante a su hijo y darle la mejor educacin para su futuro, con la ayuda de sus padres hace mas de 18 aos decidi emprender una pequea empresa de fabricacin de ladrillos (material utilizado para la construccin), en la actualidad con ella trabajan ms de 25 personas a quienes les paga un sueldo semanal, los ladrillos entrega a comerciantes que llegan hasta su localidad, los embarcan y llevan a distribuir a otras ciudades.
Este crdito es para comprar madera y arcilla para la elaboracin de los ladrillos, esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal, es la presidenta del mismo y est muy contenta porque el grupo es muy unido.
Su sueo es tener un camin para entregar sus productos.

loan.use: Comprar arcilla y madera.

texts.es:

En este lugar vive la seora Neyda, tiene 50 aos de edad, mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun viven en su casa y el menor estudia en universidad. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Ella para ganar algo por su cuenta se dedica a la cra pollos y gallinas criollas, en temporadas tiene hasta cien pollos los cuales los cra durante tres meses que es el tiempo que se demoran para listos para la venta, despus de este tiempo cuando ya estn listos los pela y vende por libras a los conocidos que llegan hasta su casa comprar sus productos, ella tambin se dedica a realizar trabajos de limpieza de pinchaguas (pescados), lleva ms de 15 aos con esta actividad y le va bien.
Este nuevo crdito lo va utilizar en comprar la mayor cantidad de pollos, alimentos y medicinas para sus animalitos. Est en el Banco Comunal hace 8 aos y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los crditos.
Sus sueos son seguir adelante.

loan.use: Comprar pollos, alimento y medicinas para los mismos.

En la parroquia Crucita del cantn Portoviejo encontramos un lugar conocido como los Arenales, aqu cada quince das se renen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas por su gastronoma y por la calidez de su gente.
En este lugar vive la seora Regina, tiene 31 aos de edad, mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 14 y 11 aos de edad, ambos estudian en colegio. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Ella realiza el crdito para ayudar a su esposo, l se dedica a la pesca y utiliza el crdito para sus faenas en alta mar, ella se dedica tareas de limpieza de los peces una vez que desembarcan en las playas de su localidad. Su esposo sale desde la madrugada para regresar por las tardes, es all donde nuestra amiga entra en accin y empieza con su labor de limpieza de los peces para entregarlos a los comerciantes que llegan hasta los Arenales a recoger los productos y luego llevarlos a las grandes empresas en la ciudad de Manta. Llevan ms de 13 aos dedicados a esta labor y es as como han sacado adelante a su familia. p> Este crdito lo va a emplear en comprar materiales para la pesca como combustibles, redes, piolas y varias cosas necesarias para la pesca. Est en el Banco Comunal hace ms de 2 aos, es la secretaria del banco y le gusta por los beneficios y crditos que ofrece la institucin.
Sus sueos son tener un carro para distribuir sus productos directamente a las empresas

loan.use: Comprar combustible, redes, piolas y otros materiales para la pesca.

texts.es:

En este lugar vive la seora Jessica, tiene 31 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 12, 9 y 2 aos de edad, los mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Ella se dedica a la cra de chanchos y pollos, tiene una pequea granja en su casa, en temporadas compra de cien a doscientos pollos los cuales los cra durante dos a tres meses que es el tiempo que se demoran en estar listos para la venta, despus de este tiempo cuando ya estn listos los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad. Ella tambin utiliza parte del crdito para el negocio de su esposo el cual se dedica a la pesca y requiere de materiales para realizar su labor, l lleva ms de 14 aos dedicado a la pesca y le va muy bien.
Este nuevo crdito lo va utilizar en comprar la mayor cantidad de pollos, alimento para animales y materiales para la pesca. Lleva ms de dos aos en el Banco, es la tesorera del grupo y est muy contenta porque le han ayudado mucho.
Sus sueos son tener un barco para que su esposo salga a realizar sus faenas de pesca.

loan.name: Ayda Merelin

She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy stocks of NATASHA & AVON for sell. Maria Florence has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 . In the future, Maria Florence hopes to improve her business.

loan.name: Rosalie

texts.en: Rosalie is 66 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. Rosalie has a shop that sells firewood per tie. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 12,000 to buy stocks of firewood for sell. Rosalie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 . In the future, Rosalie hopes to improve her business.

loan.use: to buy stocks of firewood for sell

loan.name: Felicidad

texts.en: Felicidad is 62 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with 10 children. Felicidad has a shop that sells bananas per kilogram using their multipurpose cab. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of bananas for sell. Felicidad has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 . In the future,Felicidad hopes to improve her business.

loan.use: to buy stocks of bananas for sell

loan.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is a 48-year old resident of Guba, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She provides her 7 children needs from the little amount of 8,000 she gains monthly from her own piggery business for 15 years as an aid to the income gained from her husband. However in 2006 she joined GDMPC, and she applies a loan at GDMPC micro finance amounting of 10,000 to buy feeding supplies and for the cost of shelter repair. She wants to make expansion to her business one day.

loan.use: to buy feeding supplies and for the cost of shelter repair

loan.name: Rey

texts.en: Rey is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 2 children. Rey has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He has had this business for 6 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell. Rey has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011. In the future, Rey hopes to improve his business.

loan.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell

loan.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en: Ma. Teresa is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with 2 children. Ma. Teresa has a food shop or carenderia that sells viands like afritada, caldereta & adobo . She is also buying & selling bananas & firewood per tie. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 15,000 to buy raw ingredients for making viands for sell. Ma. Teresa has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Ma. Teresa hopes to improve her business.

loan.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands for sell

loan.name: Keat

texts.en:
Keat is 43 years old and married with 4 single children. She lives with her family in Baray district of Kompong Tom province, Cambodia. She is a farmer who grows especially rice with a great help from her husband. Form more income, Keat built a small wooden piggery to raise some piglets at home. This micro business earns her a suitable income after 3-5 months of fattening pigs. Another part of the familys main income is provided by her husband who is dedicated to firewood selling business.
Keat would like to request a loan to purchase an additional buffalo to keep working on the farm and for hauling firewood trailer. She hopes that she will be able to improve her living status next coming years as she strives to work hard.

loan.use: to purchase an additional buffalo to keep working on the farm and for hauling firewood trailer.

loan.name: Alejo

texts.en:
Alejo is married with 5 children. Alejo is 56-years-old and lives in the Philippines.
Alejo is operating a service-based business,providing transportation services to local community member to earn a living. He has been doing this for 4 years and every month he earn 3,000.00 from this work. He has requested a loan of 7,000.00 to repair existing vehicle for better service.
Alejo been a member of GDMPC in 2007. In the future, Alejo hopes to finished the study of his children and to gain double income out from his business.

loan.use: to repair existing vehicle for better service.

loan.name: Laxita

texts.en: Laxita is from Bagakay, Ozamiz City. She is 58 years old. Laxita is widowed and has four children. To make a living, Laxita owns & operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising crops. Laxita has been engaged in her business for 3 years and she earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2010, Laxita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Laxita is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family.

loan.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loan.name: Amigos Por Siempre (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Municipal en la ciudad de Portoviejo se renen cada quince das los socios del Banco Comunal Amigos Por Siempre. Los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, servicios, entre otras cosas. Ellos ya realizaron un crdito y les fue muy bien, ahora esperan seguir adelante mejorando aun ms su vida y sus negocios.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la seora Marlene, tiene 36 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tiene dos hijos de aos de 14 y 13 aos de edad. Su marido es albail.
Ella adems de ser una gran ama de casa tambin se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale a recorrer la ciudad de lunes a viernes ya sea en las maanas o en las tardes, deja sus productos a crdito y cobra cada semana. Para comprar su mercadera y surtirse de productos se traslada hasta la ciudad de Guayaquil cada fin de mes o cuando necesita mercadera, Tiene 4 aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crdito es para comprar pantalones, camisas y ropa interior sobre todo de nios ya que es poca de entrada a clases y sus clientes le piden estas prendas. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera y le gusta porque los crditos son de gran ayuda.
Su sueo es tener una boutique.
Las tres fotos pequeas son de dos socias y un socio que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tom la foto del grupo.

loan.use: Comprar pantalones, camisas y ropa interior.

loan.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is 30 years old married with two school-aged children. Rowena is very responsible diligent person she make sure that she give all the need of her family. Rowena is asking a loan to have additional income to sustain the need of her family. She requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy spices, noodles, snack foods and drinks for her sari-sari store (community based store).

loan.use: to buy spices, noodles, snack foods and drinks for her store

loan.name: Esterlita

texts.en: Esterlita is married. She is 37-years-old and lives in the Tinacla-an, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Esterlita is a farmer and she manage a rice production as their source of income for 6 years and every month she earn 7,000.00 from this work. She has requested a loan of 15,000.00 to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Esterlita been a member of GDMPC in 2010. In the future, Esterlita hopes to improve/expand her business.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loan.name: Catalina

texts.en: Catalina is married and has a child. She is 46 years old and lives in Guba, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Catalina owns and operates a plot of farm land, where she plants bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 8 years and earns PHP 1,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Catalina has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for 2 years. In the future, Catalina's plan is to save her returns in order to buy a car.

loan.use: to purchase farm chemicals

loan.name: Gemma

texts.en: She is engaged in hog raising business for three years. Gemma M. is 44 years old married to Manayon with four grown up children. She is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy sack of feed and additional piglet to expand her hog raising business. She dream someday that her business turn into big business.

loan.use: to buy sack of feed and piglet for her business

loan.name: Enkhtsetseg

texts.en:
Enkhtsetseg is a-47-year old widow and lives with her two daughters, aged 22 and 25, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her family lives in a ger, a traditional Mongolian felt tent, in the outer ger districts of the city. Her youngest daughter is a student while her oldest daughter helps with her business.
Enkhtsetseg supports her family by operating a shoe retail stall at Narantuul, the largest outdoor market in Mongolia with help from her elder daughter. When she first began her business in 2002, she was a contracted seller of a local shoes factory and she didn't have her own working capital.
As result of her hard work, today she has 4,5 million Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) in working capital at her stall. During the past ten years, she has gained a lot of experience and she has been able to improve her living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to purchase shoes and gloves for spring.

loan.use: to purchase shoes and gloves for spring

loan.name: Filomina

texts.en:
Filomina is from Gata Diot, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 61 years old. Filomina is married and has three children.
To make a living, Filomina owns and operates a retail business venture. Filomina has been in her business for 2 years and earns 2,300 PHP a month for these activities.
Filomina is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to buy more stocks to sell such as soaps, milk and etc. In 2011, Filomina joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loan.use: to buy more stocks to sell such as soaps, milk and etc.

loan.name: Jessie

texts.en: Jessie N.34 years old married with three grown up children. She is engaged in hog raising business for six years and earn PHP 2,000 a month. And she is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase vitamins and feed for her business so that she can sell it in the future. She hope that her business expand so that she can meet the need of her family.

loan.use: to buy vitamins and feed for her hog raising business

loan.name: Run

texts.en:
Run is from Pouk district, located in Siem Reap province. She was born and grew up there. She is 29 years old and married with 3 single children who are attending school. She works a local rice farmer and takes some times at home to weave bamboo baskets to help her husband generate income for the family. She has been active in the two businesses for many years.
With the amount she requested from HKL, Run wants to buy construction supplies to fix her house partially as its needed to be repaired on time before the rainy season arrives and Itll be suffered by the drop of the rain. She feels very happy to receive this fund to renovate her house to be a suitable shelter.

loan.use: to buy construction supplies to fix her house partially.

loan.name: Roberta

texts.en: Roberta is from Gata Diot, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 47 years old. Roberta is married and has 2 children. To make a living, Roberta raises crops, primarily bananas, for sale. Roberta has been in her business for 6 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2007, Roberta joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Roberta is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase pesticides. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to purchase pesticides.

loan.name: Elvira

texts.en: Elvira is married. She is 38-years-old and lives in the Panta-on, Ozamis City. Elvira is a farmer and she operates a banana production to earn a living. She has been doing this for 8 years and every month she earn 3,000.00 from this work. She has requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Elvira has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, Elvira hopes to improve/expand her business.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loan.name: Sherwin Oliver

texts.en:
Sherwin Oliver offer transportation services to his co-villagers. He is 32 years old and married to Janet who is a high school teacher within their town.According to him,the main source of their income comes primarily from the salary of his wife.So, as the head of the family, he needs to work out his transportation business to further help his wife in obtaining success in life. Sherwin Oliver is thankful because he is blessed with three infant-aged children.
Sherwin oliver has operated his motorcycle transport service for over 14 years and earn approximately P3,000.The generated income to his transportation services business was used to their basic needs and other household expenses.Aside from transportation business,he is also engaged to farming business particularly, in corn field. He has been doing all his best to provide his family a better way of living and save some amount for the preparation of his children education.
Sherwin Oliver would like to borrow bigger capital amount of P10,000 which will be use for repair of his side car. He believes that this amount of loan would really of great help to him because he could sustain their daily needs and educate all his children.

loan.use: to be use in repair of side car of his motorcycle transport

loan.name: Mariza

texts.en: Mariza is married who has 2 children. Mariza is 27 years old, and resides at Kinuman Norte, Ozamis City, Philippines. Mariza cultivates a corn production business to earn a living and she's been 3 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2009, Mariza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Mariza wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loan.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is engaged in hog raising business for one year. She is married with two grown up children. She is asking a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and additional piglet for additional income in able to sustain the need of her family. In the future hope that her business expand to give the need of her family.

loan.use: to buy feed and piglet

loan.name: Rodolfo

texts.en:
Hog raising,is the main source of income of Rodolfo's family. He is 53 years old,married,having six children.At his age, he needs to double his hard work in order to send his three children in school and provide their basic commodities.
Rodolfo plans to buy four piglets and livestock feeds but the income generated for his business is no longer enough due to increase of their daily expenses. With this regard, he is asking for a loan amounting to P30,000. He hopes to avail this loan amount in order to improve his business which enable him to improve their way of living and support his children education.

loan.use: to purcahse livestock feeds and four piglets to be raised

loan.name: Janely

texts.en: Janely is married who has two children. Janely is 20 years old, and resides at Prenza, Tangub City: Philippines. Janely operates a family member's business where they plants, harvests and sell banana for their living and she's been 2 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 6,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2011, Janely joined GDMPC. In the future, Janely wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loan.name: Petronela

texts.en:
Petronela, is aged 43 years and is married to Lazarus, 53 years old man. They have 6 children who are under 22 years. They are: Bernabas, Desi, Ace, Andarias, Mathias and Helin. Some of them are working and some are still attending school. In order to meet the needs of her family Petronela runs a kiosk business since 5 years ago. She sells daily basic needs i.e. detergent, instant noodle, bath soap, betel vine and fried cake (donuts and fried banana). She works for the business for 14 hours a day while taking care of her family.
As a mother of 6 children, Petronela works hard to fulfill the everyday needs of her family including the education cost of her children. Petronela is thinking to run a motor taxi business, therefore she is requesting a loan from TLM amounting to IDR, 10,000,000; she would like to spend the money on a second-hand motorcycle and stocks for the kiosk stock i.e. sugar, coffee, tea bag, etc.

loan.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle and stocks for the kiosk stock i.e. sugar, coffee, tea bag, etc.

loan.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie is 44 years old. She is engaged in buying and selling business. Her husband name is Juanito, he is a farmer in the village of Rang-ay. Sometimes he helps her to sell in the local community. Julie has seven children; some of them are currently going to school.
Julie wants to continue sending her children in school and to buy more products to sell. In this regard, Julie is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 50,000 to buy meat, fish and vegetables to resell. She believes that she can improve her business through her patience and strong determination.

loan.use: to buy meat, fish and vegetables to resell

loan.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda works hard to provide the needs of her family. She runs a sari-sari store and requested a PHP 25,000 loan to buy grocery items like snack, breads, cooking oil and soft drinks. She has been running the general store for six years and very happy for the improvement of their living situation that was acquired.
In the future, Yolanda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loan.use: to buy grocery items like snack, breads, cooking oil and soft drinks

loan.name: Severino

texts.en: Severino lives in Poblacion, Clarin Misamis Occidental. He is 49 years old, married and has two children. For 5 years, he has made a living by providing transportation services and earns about 6,000 PHP a month from his work. In 2009, Severino joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his life and ability to engage in business. He is applying a loan, of 10,000 PHP, to repair his vehicle so he can provide better service to his customers. He plans to use the additional revenue made possible by this loan to improve his family's living conditions.

loan.use: to repair his vehicle so he can provide better service to his customers

loan.name: Meas

texts.en:
Meas, age 55, makes a living in farming business from Kompong Cham province. She owns a small piece of farmland and the rice production that is collected from the harvest is not enough to satisfy the familys needs. Therefore, Meas normally rents additional farmland from others villagers to deal with her situation. Presently, Meas becomes a single parent and lives with only a son who works as a construction worker.
So now, Meas decided to look for a loan from Kiva, through HKL to add to her savings to purchase a plot of farmland to grow her business. For her prospect, Meas wants to further expand her business and make a sustainability of living.

loan.use: to purchase a plot of farmland to grow her farming business.

loan.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 53 years old. She has seven children. Lucia is a widowed. As she said, being single parent is very difficult but Lucia still brings her best to meet their daily needs. She uses her income to pay the electric bill and for her family's daily needs.
Due to high cost of basic commodities, Lucia is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fish such as milk fish and tilapia to sell. Lucia hopes to increase her profits so that she can sustain the financial needs of the family and save money for the future. She believes that through her patience in managing her business she will be able to improve the family's standard of living.

loan.use: to purchase fish such as milk fish and tilapia to sell

loan.name: Florita

texts.en: Florita is from Kinuman Norte, Ozamiz City. She is 40 years old. Florita is married and has four children. To make a living, Florita manages their gardening, where she plants a variety of vegetables such as ampalaya. Florita has been in her business for 2 years and earns 2,000 a month from it. In 2010, Florita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Florita is requesting a new loan of 5,100 PHP, which will be used to buy fertilizer. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to buy fertilizer

loan.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christina is 22 years old. She is married and has two children. Christina sells fish in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over one year and earns approximately PHP 500 a week for these activities.
Now, she is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 which will be used to purchase different kinds of fish such as, milk fish and tilapia to resell. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested to further develop her business.

loan.use: to purchase different kinds of fish such as, milk fish and tilapia to resell

loan.name: Feliza

texts.en: Feliza is from Kinuman Norte, Ozamiz City. She is 49 years old and is married and has two children. To make a living Feliza owns and operates an agricultural business, raising crops. Feliza has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns 8,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2010 Feliza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Feliza is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to purchase seedlings, fertilizer and young seeds to plant. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to purchase seedlings, fertilizer and young seeds to plant.

loan.name: Alfreda

texts.en: Alfreda is from Sta Cruz, Tangub City. She is 44 years old. Alfreda is married and has 3 child. To make a living, Alfreda owns and operates a banana production business for their living. Alfreda has been engaged in her business for 12 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2009, Alfreda joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Alfreda is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to buy farm chemicals. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loan.use: to buy farm chemicals

loan.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is from the village of Rang-ay. She is 49 years old. She is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Nora sells different kinds of fish in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over fifteen years and earns approximately 300 PHP a day for these activities.
At this time, Nora wants to avail PHP 10,000 to purchase different kinds of fish such as, tilapia, bighead and milk fish to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to pay the tuition fees of her children.

loan.use: to purchase different kinds of fish such as, tilapia, bighead and milk fish to sell

loan.name: Gloria

texts.en: Buying and selling fish is the primary source of income. Gloria is 38 years old, and is married. She lives with her family in the village of Rang-ay. At this time, Gloria is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy different kinds of fish such as milk fish and "tilapia" to sell in their village. This business helps Gloria, because it's the only source of income she has to raise her family.

loan.use: to buy different kinds of fish such as milk fish and "tilapia" to sell in their village

loan.name: Sokhearn

texts.en: Sokhearn, 50, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is truck driver who approximately earns USD 4 per day. Her two children are employed in rubber plantation. They earn about USD 10 per day. Due the difficulty in the familys transportation, Sokhearn is requesting for a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business to generate more income to support the family.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is from the town of Cabatuan. She is 36 years old, married has three children. To make a living, she has been involved in buying and selling business for over ten years and earns approximately PHP 300 daily.
According to Theresa, through the income generated from her business she had been able to give daily allowances to her children in school. Now, she wants to avail a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase different kinds of fish such as, tilapia and milk fish. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested to further develop her business.

loan.use: to purchase different kinds of fish such as, tilapia and milk fish

loan.name: Kanda

texts.en: Kanda, 29, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been breeding pigs to sell for over six years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband runs the business of buying junk materials to resale at the junk shop. Approximately, he earns USD 4 per day. In order to improve her familys economy, Kanda is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase farmland for growing agricultural crops. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to breed more pigs and help her children get bachelors degree.

loan.use: to purchase farmland for growing agricultural crops

loan.name: Kim

texts.en: Kim, 34, is married, resides with her husband and five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a sanitation worker who earns about USD 2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker. He earns about USD 3 per day. In order to improve her familys livelihood, Kim is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase rice to resale for a profitable price. By doing so, she would earn extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelors degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house to provide convenient living condition for her family.

loan.use: to purchase rice to resale for a profitable price

loan.name: Som

texts.en: Som, 44, is married, resides with her husband and seven children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been breeding pigs for over ten years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is involved in growing rice and renting sound equipment for over three years earning approximately USD 5 per day. Two of her children are employed; one is a driver and another one is a teacher. Approximately, they earn USD 6 per day. Due to the difficulty in the familys transportation, Som is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a pig farm and help her children get bachelors degree. Moreover, she plans to build a new house to provide better living condition for the family.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Yun

texts.en: Yun, 30, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is employed in a sanitation company and earns approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a security guard and earns about USD 3 per day. Due to the difficulty in the familys transportation, Yun is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to run a new business of selling clothes in the market and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Voeurn

texts.en: Voeurn, 55, is married, resides with her husband and six children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries and firewood for over three years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a marriage broker who earns approximately USD 2 per day. Three of her children are employed; two are construction worker and another one is a creel maker. Due to the difficulty in the familys transportation, Voeurn is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would able her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future she would like to expand her grocery store and help her children get bachelors degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger to provide enough space for her familys living.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Kha

texts.en: Kha, 34, is married, resides with his wife and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He has been running the business of buying cattle to resale for over seven years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. His wife runs a souvenir and clothes shop. Approximately, she earns USD 7 per day. In order to improve his wifes business, Kha is requesting for a loan of USD 1500 to purchase more fashionable clothes to sell. This loan would enable his wife to have more fashionable clothes to attract more customers and earn more profit. In the future, he would like to use the further profit to expand the business and help his children get bachelors degree. Moreover, he hopes to rebuild his present house to make it comfortable for his familys living.

loan.use: to purchase more fashionable clothes to sell

loan.name: Salmun

texts.en:
Salmun, a 59 year old man is married to Yohana, a 58 year old lady. They have 8 children, between 22 to 33 years old.
Even though Salmun has a job as a teacher but Salmun also spend his spare time to run a kiosk business in order to generate more income for his family. The business is located about 10 km from his residence.
Salmun provides corn, tamarind seed, rice, instant noodle, vegetables etc at his kiosk. Salmun is happy for this business enables him to finance his 4 children who are still at the university. Salmun would like to complete his kiosk with more stocks. Therefore he is seeking a loan of IDR 5,000,000 to purchase rice, corn and tamarind seeds etc.

loan.use: to purchase rice, corn and tamarind seeds etc.

loan.name: Thy

texts.en: Thy, 31, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been employed as sanitation worker for over eight years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Thy wants to rebuild her present house. With this goal in mind, Thy is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase timbers for constructing her house. This loan would enable her get a comfortable house for her familys living. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and send her children to a good school.

loan.use: to purchase timbers for constructing her house

loan.name: Srey

texts.en: Srey, 40, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a truck driver who approximately earns USD 15 per day. In order to improve her familys economy, Srey would like to run a new business. Therefore, Srey is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase groceries to sell in order to generate extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the further profit to expand her business and help her children get bachelors degree. Moreover, she plans to repair some parts of her house.

loan.use: to purchase groceries to sell in order to generate extra income to support the family

loan.name: Nary

texts.en: Nary, 38, is married, resides with her husband, three children and a sister in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling sticky rice cake for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 4 per day. Her sister is a clothes seller who earns about USD 8 per day. In order to improve her familys living condition, Nary is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase more clothes to sell. This loan would enable her to get more fashionable clothes to sell and attract more clients. In the future, she would like to use the further profit to expand her business and help her children get bachelors degree. Moreover, she plans to build a new wooden house.

loan.use: to purchase more clothes to sell

loan.name: Yon

texts.en: Yon, 52, is widowed and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a chef in a restaurant. Approximately, she earns USD 5 per day. One of her children is employed in a hotel and earns about USD 3 per day. In order to improve her familys livelihood, Yon is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike for her son to run the public transportation service (motor taxi). This purchase would enable her son to generate extra income to support her family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it much stronger and to provide better living condition for the family.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike for her son to run the public transportation service (motor taxi)

loan.name: Noel

texts.en: Noel is 29 years old and is married to Nova. The couple is thankful, because they been blessed with two children. Noel is involved in buying and selling fish in the local community. He wants to buy more different kinds of fish to sell, but he lacks the necessary capital. In this regard, Noel is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to buy "tilapia" and milk fish to sell. He believes that the loan will help his to increase his income. He is hoping that he earn a higher income to support his family's needs.

loan.use: to buy "tilapia" and milk fish to sell

loan.name: Hing

texts.en: Hing, 27, is married, resides with his wife and three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He has been working as construction foreman for over three years, earning approximately USD 10 per day. His wife is employed in a massage shop and earns about USD 3 per day. Due to the difficulty in the familys transportation, Hing is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable him to use the saved money on his transportation expenses to the family. In the future, he would like to expand business and help his children get bachelors degree. Moreover, he plans to rebuild his present house to make it convenient for his familys living.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Hoeurn

texts.en: Hoeurn, 29, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been employed as sanitation worker for over nine years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Due to the difficulty in the familys transportation, Hoeurn is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to breed pigs to generate more income to support the family and help her children get bachelors degree.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loan.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is hard working and loving father to seven children. He is 46 years old and married.By this time, his priority in life is to give his children the opportunity to finish their studies and achieve their goals in life. His family source of income comes from his corn field and retail store business.He is grateful because he is able to run and operate his two business despite the difficulties and pain he had experienced.
Jimmy is simple man who aims to educate all his children and improve their way of living.Since, he had started borrowing additional capital from ASKI,he is able to obtain greater income which solely serve to his family.He repaid his previous loan and ask for bigger capital amounting to P10,000.This loan amount will be use to buy more fish,meat,vegetables and ingredients to restock his retail stall.He believes that his goals will be realize and this would be his ladder in obtaining success in life and business.

loan.use: to buy more meat,fish,vegetables and ingredients for his retail stall

loan.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is from the village of Rang-ay. She is 39 years old. Marivic sells fish in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately PHP 250 a day for these activities.
Now, she is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 which will be used to purchase different kinds of fish such as, milk fish and tilapia to resell. She hopes that her business will further grow and to uplift her family from poor living.

loan.use: to purchase different kinds of fish such as, milk fish and tilapia to resell

loan.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita, aged 37 is a hog raiser in the village of Libag Sur. She is married to a construction worker and they had three children attending to school. Together, they worked untiringly to generate income for children's education and sustenance. She would like to improve her small business so she is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy feeds and vaccines for the hogs. This will help hogs grow healthier.
In the future, Teresita would like to make her busines grow for the overall betterment of the family's living condition.

loan.use: to buy feeds and vaccines for the hogs

loan.name: Crislyn

texts.en:
Raising pigs to fatten for future sale is the business of Crislyn. She is from the village of Libag Sur and is married to John. Crislyn is now 21 years old and had two young children. One is attending to primary school.
Crislyn would like to ensure good growth of her hogs so that she will offer them at higher cost upon distribution. This will help increase the income acquired from the small business. So she is now asking for a loan of P11,000 to buy medicines, feeds and vaccines for the hogs.
With good profits from the business, she will continuously provide a good education to her children and will lead them to a progressive way of life someday.

loan.use: to buy medicines, feeds and vaccines for the hogs.

loan.name: Cora

texts.en:
Cora is a helpful mother and a wife to Jose. Despite her disability, she still helped her husband generate an icome for the family. She manages a small store just in front of their house. She had been in the business for four years and earns about P200 daily. Her income really help shoulder other bills at home. She would like to sell more products to earn more income so she is asking for additional capital of P7,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, sugar, detergent soap and shampoo to sell in her store.
Someday, she hopes to make her family live progressively and gave the best education for her only child.

loan.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, sugar, detergent soap and shampoo to sell in her store.

loan.name: Rodolfo

texts.en: Rodolfo is 27 years old, happily married to Maria. They lived at the village of Libag Sur with their child. To generate an icome, Rodolfo raises hogs to fatten and sell. He also works part time in a construction site. Rodolfo earns about P3,000 each month in a construction and P2,500 whenever he sells the raise hog. He is now asking for a loan of P9,000 to buy additional piglet to raise and its feed for sustainability. He would be very thankful if this loan will be granted to him and promises to pay back on time. In the future, he hopes to achieve a stable source of income for the overall welfare of his family.

loan.use: to buy additional piglet to raise and its feed for sustainability

loan.name: Janice

texts.en: Janice is 32 years old, married and had one child. She sells dried fish to the people in her village. She offered her products on a house-to-house basis. She patiently been doing this for over four years now. She is asking for a loan of P7,000 to increase sales capacity from the business. She will buy additional dried fish to sell. In the future, Janice would like to established a stall to stock up her products. She is also praying for family's good health and good relationship to her customers. This way, she will generate continuous income from the small business.

loan.use: to buy additional dried fish to sell

loan.name: Carlito
